title: Anthropic to open first India office next year
description: Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Alphabet’s Google and Amazon.com, said on Tuesday it will open its first office in India next year.
content:
Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Alphabet's Google and Amazon.com, said on Tuesday it will open its first office in India next year, as it looks to tap into the country's growing appetite for AI tools.

title: Data center boom at risk of overbuilding, says asset management giant Ares
description: Investments have poured into data center projects as a way to cash in on booming demand for processing power unleashed by the advent of artificial intelligence.
content:
The flood of capital pouring into AI infrastructure is raising the risks of overcapacity as the world’s biggest investors look to cash in on the artificial intelligence boom, according to Ares Management Co-President Kipp deVeer.

title: Exclusive-Data streaming software maker Confluent explores sale, sources say
description: (Reuters) -Confluent is exploring a sale after attracting acquisition interest, according to three people familiar with the matter, the latest data infrastructure company to draw suitors for its potential in supporting artificial intelligence development.

title: CCI study finds 67% of Indian AI startups focused on building AI applications, reshaping India's business landscape
description: A recent survey by the Competition Commission of India (CCI) has found that nearly 67 per cent of Indian AI (Artificial intelligence) startups are primarily engaged in developing AI-based applications, with the majority relying on open-source technologies.

title: Exclusive: Data streaming software maker Confluent explores sale, sources say
description: Confluent is exploring a sale after attracting acquisition interest, according to three people familiar with the matter, the latest data infrastructure company to draw suitors for its potential in supporting artificial intelligence development.

title: Anthropic Expands AI Influence with New India Office
description: Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic, backed by Google and Amazon, will open its first office in India next year. The decision follows the company's success in India with its AI model, Claude. Located in Bengaluru, this office marks Anthropic's second base in the Asia Pacific region.
content:
Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup supported by tech giants Alphabet and Amazon, announced plans to establish its inaugural office in India by next year. The move aims to capitalize on India's burgeoning demand for AI tools.

title: Nvidia To Finance Musk’s xAI Chips As Part Of $20 Billion Deal
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is raising more financing than initially planned, tapping backers including Nvidia Corp. to lift its ongoing funding round to $20 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
content:
Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is raising more financing than initially planned, tapping backers including Nvidia Corp. to lift its ongoing funding round to $20 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
